00043    #define MAX(a, b)  (((a) > (b)) ? (a) : (b))

00298          static uint8 getMunicipal( uint32 location ) {
00299             return uint8((location & 0xff000000) >> 24);
00300          }
00301 
00307          static void setMunicipal(uint8 municipal,
00308                                   uint32 &location ) {
00309             location = (location & 0x00ffffff) | 
00310                        (((uint32) municipal << 24) & 0xff000000);
00311          }

00319             return uint16(location & 0x0000ffff);
00320          }
